original_text: For John had been saying to Herod, “It is not lawful for you to have your brother's wife.”
korean_text: 이는 요한이 헤롯에게 말하되 동생의 아내를 취한 것이 옳지 않다 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: For John had been saying to Herod
“It is not lawful for you to have your brother's wife.”
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 형제의 아내를 두는 것은 옳지 않습니다.
